title: Flat Earth Theory - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 1/24/20
itunes:title: Flat Earth Theory - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 1/24/20
description:
Guest host Richard Syrett and filmmaker Rob Skiba discuss his belief that the Earth is not a sphere in space but is actually a flat disc covered by a dome, using evidence from verses in the Bible.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

content:encoded:
Guest host Richard Syrett and filmmaker Rob Skiba discuss his belief that the Earth is not a sphere in space but is actually a flat disc covered by a dome, using evidence from verses in the Bible.

itunes:summary: A discussion on the theory that the Earth is not actually a globe, but a flat plane.
